subject: Re: Book for sale on how to modify the 12-469, why?
author: Steve Hultay
full_text:
Mike,

There is also a book by Craig Telesha called "Strange Frequencies" 
where he has step by step pictures to hack the 12-469.

https://www.prairieghosts.com/ghh.html

-Steve H.




--- In EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com, "M.A. Coletta (Mike)" 
<michaelcoletta@...> wrote:
>
> It was brought to my attention that a guy named Dave Oester is 
selling 
> an ebook on how to modify the Radio Shack 12-469, something he 
calls 
> the 'Digcom'. (Isn't it just the Radio Shack Hack?)
> Has anyone purchased this book? Has anyone had dealings with this 
Dave 
> Oester?  I guess he produces other types of ebooks too.
> 
> There is so much FREE information out there on how to modify the 12-
> 469, I wonder if his book is actually selling...
> 
> Thanks,
> - Mike C. (UFO Geek)
>
